nodes.name: ERC20Basic

nodes.documentation:
@title ERC20 interface
@dev see https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20
nodes.name: ERC20

nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: add

nodes.documentation:
@title Basic token
@dev Basic version of StandardToken, with no allowances.
nodes.name: BasicToken

nodes.documentation: @dev Total number of tokens in existence
nodes.name: totalSupply
transfer
balanceOf

nodes.documentation:
@title Standard ERC20 token

 * @dev Implementation of the basic standard token.
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20
Based on code by FirstBlood: https://github.com/Firstbloodio/token/blob/master/smart_contract/FirstBloodToken.sol
nodes.name: StandardToken
transferFrom
approve
allowance
increaseApproval
decreaseApproval
Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner
renounceOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: _transferOwnership
MintableToken
mint

nodes.documentation:
@dev Function to stop minting new tokens.
@return True if the operation was successful.
nodes.name: finishMinting

nodes.documentation:
@title Burnable Token
@dev Token that can be irreversibly burned (destroyed).
nodes.name: BurnableToken

nodes.documentation:
@dev Burns a specific amount of tokens.
@param _value The amount of token to be burned.
nodes.name: burn
